ja493:7.4: vidalasūpiyo → siṅgiṁ bidalasūpiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); siṅgividalasūpiyo (sya1ed, sya2ed); siṅgīveraṁ lasūpiyo (mr) siṅginti siṅgiverādikaṁ uttaribhaṅgaṁ. vidalasūpiyoti muggasūpādayo (aṭṭha.)
ja493:8.1: tattha bhutvā khāditvā → bhutvā ca pivitvā ca (pts-vp-pli1)
ja493:13.2: ca kambalā → uddiyāne ca kambale (bj, pts-vp-pli1); uddhiyāni ca kambalā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja493:18.1: tassānādiyitvā → tassa anāditvā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); tassa anādiyitvā (pts-vp-pli1)
ja493:21.4: haneyyārisakaṁ → haneyya disataṁ (bj); haneyya disakaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
